Articles.Content:
a

Edited January 7, 2016 by fgjordy

Hi! By chance, have you read the Forum Guidelines? Unfortunately for this idea, Rule 2.2j specifically prohibits "staging for purposes of roleplay" So, I doubt that anyone will touch this one with a 39 1/2 meter pole, sorry  However, it is OK as far as I know to create a set of 'roleplayed' missions within a fictional framework provided one and only one user is playing all of the roles on their own. Quite often this sort of thing leads to pretty good fanfiction-style mission reports  

Why no roleplaying allowed, you ask? Well, that's been discussed at length many times, most recently in this thread regarding the closing of a certain subforum. I post this message, and that link, in the hopes of saving everyone the trouble of going over this thoroughly settled matter yet again

Ooh im sorry, i did read it but it slipped my mind i think, thanks anyway!
